title: impact
description: A possible impact of an asteroid

periodStart.description: the start year of the period of which the asteroid can impact with earth

periodEnd.description: the start year of the period of which the asteroid can impact with earth

possibleImpacts.description: all possible impacts the asteroid can have in the given period

cumulativeImpactProbability.description: The probability the asteroid has to have an impact on earth

absoluteMagnitude.description: the absolute magnitude the asteroid has

cumulativePalermoScale.description: The cumulative classification the asteriod has on the palermo scale which determines how dangerous the asteroid impact is.

maximumPalermoScale.description: The maximum classification the asteriod has on the palermo scale which determines how dangerous the asteroid impact is.
